select fstore_name, ftitle, nvl(totalprice,0) as totalprice, nvl(totalemail,0) as totalemail, nvl(totalreply,0) as totalreply, fimg1, trunc(cfunding_end_date-sysdate,0) expire from funding f left join (select f.fid, sum(oitotalprice) as totalprice from order_item oi join product_option po on oi.poid=po.poid join funding_product fp on po.fpid=fp.fpid join funding f on f.fid=fp.fid group by f.fid) total on total.fid= f.fid left join ( select f.fid, count(distinct o.memail) as totalemail from order_item oi join product_option po on oi.poid=po.poid join funding_product fp on po.fpid=fp.fpid join funding f on f.fid=fp.fid join orders o on oi.oid=o.oid group by f.fid) cnt on cnt.fid=f.fid join competition c on c.cid=f.cid left join (select f.fid, count(r.memail) as totalreply from reply r join funding f on r.fid=f.fid group by f.fid) r on r.fid = f.fid where fstatus = 'funding' and sysdate between cfunding_start_date and cfunding_end_date
and ctid='1'
and ctid='2'
and ctid='3'
and ctid='4'
and ctid='5'
and ctid='6'
and ctid='7'
and tid='1'
and tid='2'
and tid='3'
order by
totalprice desc
totalemail desc
fdate
totalreply desc
totalprice desc
,f.fid
